Vampire Huntress - Lament of the Sun

name: Vampire Huntress: Lament of the Sun
storyline:
Inspired by the classics of the genre, such as the original Resident Evil and Koudelka, Vampire Huntress - Lament of the Sun brings you the classic survival horror experience, where every bullet - and stake - counts. Make difficult decisions of what to bring with you, and what to leave in storage. What enemies to dispatch and what to avoid.

Adjust the experience based on your preferences, with settings for limited saves, auto-targeting, inventory size, and more!

Fight your way through the vast interconnected world of Vampire Huntress, in and around the massive Castle Whitecairn. Solve puzzles, find secrets and shortcuts and collect items necessary for your continued survival. As you explore the world, you will face enemies each more dangerous and fierce than the last!

Immerse yourself in the dark fantasy world of Vampire Huntress - Lament of the Sun as you play as Luna Ashcroft, a vampire in search for answers. Her betrothed, Lord Voltarius, has returned after 1000 years and set in motion a plan that not only shakes Luna personally, but threatens to also shake the very foundation of existence.

In order to fight the horrors of the the night, a huntress needs tools. Fight with weapons such as the Ignis Aeternus, an 8-shot revolver, as well as The Redeemer, a triple-barreled shotgun. Explore every nook and cranny to find precious ammunition and combine resources to create healing items for safety.
summary: Classic survival horror experience set in a dark gothic world. Play as Luna Ashcroft and explore an interconnected world filled with incomprehensible horrors, mind-bending puzzles and countless secrets. Are you ready to face the horrors of the night? LET THE HUNT BEGIN!
